casebody.data:
DIGGS
v.
NOVANT HEALTH, et al. No. 299P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 30, 2006. Roberta B. King, Joshua H. Bennett, Winston-Salem, for Forsyth Medical Center. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Harvey L. Kennedy, Annie Brown Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for Mary Diggs. Linwood Jones, Raleigh, for N.C. Hospital Association. Harvey L. Cosper, Jr., William B. Cannon, Charlotte, for NCADA. James R. Morgan, Jr., Winston-Salem, Ronald W. Burris, Albemarle, for NC Chapter of Am. Society.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 628 S.E.2d 851.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of October 2006 by Defendant (Forsyth Memorial Hospital) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of October 2006."
